column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Eventsandparticipants | Event # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=Every time I have to go to school or work I have to always ride a public bus .
#text=I have to make sure that I am by the bus stop in order to catch the bus on time .
#text=When I get on the bus , I have to pay the bus fare .
#text=I live in a big city , so there 's always a lot of people needing to take the bus .
#text=Therefore ; sometimes I am not lucky to find a seat to sit on .
#text=In that case , I would have to stand up .
#text=Overall , riding a bus is not enjoyable because it tends to be dirty , people are very loud , and it is very crowded .
#text=Not to mention , it always smells like urine .
#text=My commute is always a long one .
#text=I usually stay on the bus for one hour .
#text=For that one hour on the bus , I listen to music or play on my cell phone .
#text=I get off the bus and reach my destination .
